definition: group buying/collective buying/buying by a group of individuals who negotiate a discount for the group
round/lump/ball/to roll into a ball/to gather/regiment/group/society/classifier for a lump or a soft mass: wad (of paper), ball (of wool), cloud (of smoke)

sentences.english: Yes, I was last year formal abdication comes down to run Hefei group to buy a network.

sentences.english: Can I pick up my Corporate Purchase at my eslite bookstore?

sentences.english: Fang Xingdong says, suiting a group to buy this kind to hit those who change promotion pattern is specific commodity.

sentences.english: The ability to group-buy with friends gives users discounts and deals.
sentences.chinese: 而且和朋友一起團購還能給用戶交易折扣。

sentences.english: Group-buying is a recently-developed shopping strategy originate in China.
sentences.chinese: 團購是最近發展起來的購物模式，起源於中國。

sentences.english: Many websites including many major Chinese websites have also entered this group purchasing craze.
sentences.chinese: 許多網站包括中國知名的大站都加入這波團購熱之中。

sentences.english: It is now one of the leading Chinese group-buying websites.
sentences.chinese: 現在它成爲了中國大宗團購網站的領頭人之一。

sentences.english: What make a person anxious more is wind is cast also favor the group buys a network no longer.
sentences.chinese: 更令人擔憂的是風投也不再青睞團購網。

sentences.english: China had over 1, 215 group-buying sites as of August.
sentences.chinese: 截至8月，中國有超過1215個團購網站。

sentences.english: BlackBerries, as an example, are most often purchased by corporate customers.
sentences.chinese: 例如，黑莓大部分銷量都是通過團購的。

sentences.english: From the consumer's perspective, Groupons can be very deeply discounted.
sentences.chinese: 從消費者的角度來看，團購可以提供力度很大的折扣。

sentences.english: Chapter IV sets out the regional development strategy based buy.
sentences.chinese: 第四章提出了區域型團購的開展戰略。

sentences.english: Hold the integrated furred ceiling of sound if having the special performance regiment buy?
sentences.chinese: 容聲集成吊頂有沒有專場團購的？

sentences.english: With group buying you go in together and get far better deals.
sentences.chinese: 你可以和大家一起團購並得到一個好價錢。

sentences.english: He says few of his friends are frequent users of group-buying websites.
sentences.chinese: 他說，他周圍的朋友很少有人在團購網站買東西。

definition: to buy tickets/(Tw) to buy votes (in an election)
to place an order/to book ahead
to sell/to betray/to spare no effort/to show off or flaunt
to agree/to conclude/to draw up/to subscribe to (a newspaper etc)/to order
